Calculating the total size of the `_site` deployment directory:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="shell" data-tool-name="run_terminal_cmd">
<details><summary>Tool use: **command** • Run command: Get-ChildItem -Path "_site" -Recurse -File | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum | Select-Object @{Name="Size(MB)";Expression={[math]::Round($_.Sum / 1MB, 2)}}, @{Name="Size(KB)";Expression={[math]::Round($_.Sum / 1KB, 2)}}, @{Name="Size(Bytes)";Expression={$_.Sum}}, Count</summary>

```bash
Get-ChildItem -Path "_site" -Recurse -File | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum | Select-Object @{Name="Size(MB)";Expression={[math]::Round($_.Sum / 1MB, 2)}}, @{Name="Size(KB)";Expression={[math]::Round($_.Sum / 1KB, 2)}}, @{Name="Size(Bytes)";Expression={$_.Sum}}, Count
```

```
, Count                                                                         

Size(MB) Size(KB) Size(Bytes) Count
-------- -------- ----------- -----
   74.28 76067.42    77893041  1816
```
</details>
</tool-use>

Total size of the `_site` deployment:

- **Total size: 74.28 MB** (76,067.42 KB / 77,893,041 bytes)
- **Total files: 1,816**

Includes HTML pages, images, CSS, JavaScript, and other static assets.
